string.text: Here's my dilema... Whilst 'Fox' sits here on his ass, and gets drunk with the Doctor, I have to go pick up his parcel from Prapor... I must be out of my mind .. well, this had better be worth it...
It is necessary to return to the Cordon, and find the old Hunter by the nickname of 'Sepator'.. no further instructions available...
Sakharov knows a little about the death of Fang and advises me to talk to Voronin.
According to Voronin, Fang was somehow crossed by the mercenaries. Advises me to talk to the informant. He should have information about the mercenaries. Probably from him I can learn more.
Voronin. The murder investigation proceeds.
Informant. We move a step closer.

It was necessary to extract the PDA of Tirana for the informant. I got the PDA from Dan, that swamp leach! In exchange the informant has agreed to arrange a meeting with Havre. Where I will pursue my investigation further.
Havre.

So much time has passed, and I still practically know nothing. This scum Havre involves me in his personal dirtywork. It is necessary for me to work for him for now, instead of cutting off his head. I am ready to bring all this to an end.
Havre. Continuation

Havre has sent me on Vyzhigatel - to extract to it documents. Strange documents, especially a map. All in the marks, used up up and down. Everywhere figures, arrows, time. And still, for some reason so it turns out that as soon as I have started to search for the murderer of Fang, all time mercenaries-foreigners come across to me. I all time am am tormented with vague doubts. It is good that I on a habit have made a copy of documents. It is necessary to talk to Freemanom once again. For some reason it seems to me that it stirs up also something knows.
Freeman

By means of Freeman I have learnt, who has ordered Fang - Havre. Now it is necessary only - to give one caesarean caesarean. Date of funeral is already appointed. We will go to prepare a body of the dead man.
Ecologist doubts that Ghost is dead. Under its commission descended behind Ghost diary. The diary, truth, - while the Ecologist understands very bad condition, I descend, I will talk to the Barman
Ecologist. Conversation the first.
Ghost Search

Barman has confirmed a guess of the Ecologist that Ghost was not one. With it there was its "master key" which for it was found by the Barman. I will go to the Ecologist once again, there can be it could read Ghost diary
Barman tells.
Ecologist has sent me for new sistemnik, says that without it it cannot work. At last could read a message slice. The Yakut ... I know the Yakut. I will go, I will talk to it.
Ecologist. Conversation of the second.
Yakut has sent me to Agroprom vaults. I have not found there anybody, except bloodsuckers and any people, trying me to kill. I will talk to it once again.
Yakut. The first conversation.
At last I have found it. Yes, the Ecologist has appeared the rights. Ghost is live.
Yakut. The second conversation.
As I have understood, a certain organisation or grouping hunted for Ghost. Has paid them reciprocal visit. The leader on a nickname the Animal ran. Anything... Soon we will find it.
Ghost. The first conversation.
Enemy defeated. The animal is dead. Now I can easy go to the Monolith.
Ghost. Conversation of the second.

I do not know, whether I can convey it any other way. Though, my literary trash, you, most likely, will see, when I will leave ... Dead to shame not imut ... You should know everything, it is last payment on my debts ...
That fight in Rusty Wood is not that you think, we waited for you. Expensive murder ... to Whom you have passed road, Ghost? The equipment and a legend were adjusted by the customer: nauchniki come back from the task, two are wounded, temporary camp. Ecologists ask the help, here even I would want to help ... But I had a role. From fifty metres to get to the illuminated purpose ...
You will not believe, the controller has rescued you. And you have unrolled the saviour, such here irony ... it has deduced The dogs on me and has thrown, and itself has grasped guys at a fire ...
This Swiss silly woman was good for distances, and from flight of dogs only and to wave away, as an oar. Have torn me while drove. To a fire has stolen up, blood whips, I already a round dance start to drive the buddy. I have put them ... And then 'the white haze' has rolled, the controller ... You after all has got me could me the first, and it after. But did not become, though I then have wounded you ... that Controller to me too have done an ill turn, have dropped a muzzle in a fire, now nobody learns ...
I that night as anew was born. After 'a white haze' all in another way, believe. Looked, how you bury my guys, a loot without taking ... All thought, and I could so? And, while you to the Doctor dragged me, all life have touched, a little there the good. One pus. For the sake of what veins? Neither families, nor friends. The contract behind the contract ...
For all that time that at the Doctor rested, you and have not talked to hour to me. Guessed, is not present? I all sleeping pretended to be, there were no forces in eyes to look. It is good that you have left earlier. And when I absolutely on feet have risen, the Doctor to me one thing has told: to you, Owls, the Zone life has presented, and for what, it you solve ...
I then searched for death, yes only death washing with the party went, as disdained ... On Arena week have spent, to Bestiaries, and here to shoot - at people the hand did not rise. The young growth to me was pulled, Palyonyj, say, the second pair of eyes on a nape has grown, with it will not be gone. Group of rookies drove, taught some good sense ... Knew that while debts I will not return, the Zone will not release me.
And when children have risen, who on credit who to the Mole has left, remained I one. Began to search for your customer that advance payment and the penalty to return ... Has found yet, let the earth to it will be down. Here, since that day, the fear to me also has returned ... Soon we go to spot-check, has received from Arhary the offer ... Perhaps there we will meet. Shakes everything, but again the live I feel. Whether for a long time ...
Well, Brother!! It is necessary - to find the most difficult you and to tell all ...
Owl's note for Ghost.

I remained one, the task is ruined ... These records - the only thing that keeps my person from the further disintegration ... Memory - as a sieve, but, writing down and re-reading these lines, I hope to be kept in consciousness and to reach the. The main thing - to reach, and there, under gipnodoprosom, I will tell all. I hope ... Usual mission of a convoy as it is told in the introduction. 'Working off of operations in the conditions of variable intensity of psi-fields, testing of a hardware-pharmaceutical complex of mental protection', Th there still ... Harmoniously sing nauchniki ... Though, on bearing it was visible, two from them obviously our, army ... That there was required to them, I do not know ... Possibly, have not cleaned behind myself last time ... Knowingly speak, the loony with a machine gun not so is dangerous, as any idealist in points and a white dressing gown ... Went in strange rate, frequent stops ... For gaugings as they spoke ... the Schedule of change of intensity of a psi-field have forced to learn by heart ... the Helmet heaviest , the head hoots, the neck bends sideways ... Here still injectors of these, prick each two hours ... However, psi-protection not bad ... Have got far, with sight something is created, paints absolutely is not present, all yellow, the zombie gad ... Well to us not to get used, have unrolled them ... In advanced escort there was a five of the Sarmatian ... the Sniper the good. Were ... Attack of the controller has coincided with inclusion of radiators ... Out of the schedule have joined, to see, someone there manually twists this street organ ... it Has grasped them ... Me have well put, on a tangent in a head ... the Helmet has sustained, and here all electronics - in stuff, and a brain concussion has earned ... Has regained consciousness by the evening, in live - one Sarmatian with empty Vintorezom circles round the controller goes ... I Have put them, both ... And from a brain concussion advantage happens ... Our all perished in ... Scientists too ... their Controller among themselves has pitted ... the Second days get out to the, a head is ill, a nausea inside out turns out ... in the first-aid set something is necessary, helps on a pair of clocks ... Then sit down, remember and write down ... Then - again a gloom ... In Garbage has met the stalker ... Badly remember, it the wounded man like was ... Shuganul bandyukov in ruins, to see it it stalker has hooked. .. Strange any, lay, and then a trunk to swing the beginnings - it has conceived to be shot that-whether? Has given on a neck that did not make a fool ... Has left to it the backpack, bandage, a first-aid set part, vodka and all grub - not to meal to me ... Have agreed that it when will rest in bed, PDA to ours on a post will carry mine, there the route is noted also a diary copy ... I Am afraid, not to reach to me ... it is necessary to reach ... at any cost ... the Sarmatian, forgive ...
Soldier's Note
Search for the missing Scientists

Yesterday, as always, we with the buddy ambushed, I pretended to be the wounded man. Was nobody, boringly, have done some shooting local dogs. Vazali on a glass, everything thought already, a regional ohm for today as have suddenly noticed the fighter. This pogonnik lane from the Valley, usually with fighters we try not to communicate, the loot at them with itself is not present, and are armed not bad. But this hardly hobbled. It is visible, has been wounded, wound it fine. At first it went to my party, but then, on visible, has noticed my buddy. A bough, how many time spoke to it, be not put out ahead of time. Here also has received olive in a shoulder, well still, live remained. Lines, it is good them there prepare - I Volyn have not had time to get, and it to me cut. Keep, speaks, the stalker, Nehru to be shot because of a trifle, not time to us to die. Well, I played a role up to the end, have dissolved the sucker on loots, without shooting have managed. It even has given the computer to me, carry, speaks, there, you will tell, the lieutenant such has sent. Aha, search for fools. Not, well as the child directly. I even to it was ashamed to shoot at a back. It has left, I from eaves have hardly pulled down the buddy, have tied up yes on a neck cut. On business, without insults, is for what. Razderbanili we of loots for two, vodka there, canned food. Were not in time ... Was, the swine ... Looking from a Borov, a bough ... Visors PDA Voyakin, half loot of ours and has set in Agroprom. Here to whom I with pleasure in a back fired ....
Wounded Bandit's PDA

RECORD for yesterday. 'Lines, yesterday thumped all the day long. Vodka has early come to an end. Well, I also have gone to a Borov, to occupy from obschaka. And this of a bough has shouted at me. Has told, that I was cleaned a malefice down with. Well, I also have left from base. Has decided to go in Agroprom, what for? And lines knows, thought on road vodka I will get hold. in Garbage has met these two morons. Blah, all Zone knows about this ambush. Happens, suckers fly, well so on that they and suckers. Che from them to take the ten cartridges yes to steam cans. Truth this time it has carried. More precisely, me ... These idiots had a backpack with vodka, and zakus. They have warmed up me ... I Will go with boys I will thump. I do not love one. The backpack has given to one small dog, there PDA was, has told that on base has carried. Lines , with drunk has not thought, the information interesting can was. All right tomorrow I will find it '. A Marked One: Where I will find this greenhorn? It is necessary to ask only somebody in Garbage. Perhaps who from its constant inhabitants can help me.
Fraera's PDA
So, I have found PDA fighters from Cordon. Dolgovtsy have caught this bandit, to which Fraer has transferred a backpack, it is necessary to find ten scientific first-aid sets only.
First conversation with Praporom.

Has brought an ensign in 1910 first-aid sets scientific. It has given to me PDA. Yes, 10 Zhovten'ka for the broken device. I will go to the Barman that-whether I descend, will find can whom who can repair to me it.
Second conversation with Praporom.
At all I do not know what to write. On favour Rabotnichki the Barman has lost a unique thread. It is the end?
Conversation with the Barman.

Was on Rostock, communicated with Gray. He to me has told interesting things. It appears, it and its children grazed scientists to the Radar, is more true to Red wood. Further to go were afraid. Burner could join at any moment, have settled in Warehouses, have waited three days. But scientists and have not returned. The next group of condemned men. Yes, these scientists obviously are not on friendly terms with a head. Hoped to pass there where it was possible to nobody.
Flash card of mercenary Ara.

Record for. Number: Our person at scientists has told that any group goes to expedition. Where, has not informed, so we have sat down on Rostock near to the tunnel. We waited for them not for long, by the evening there was an advance party of fighters, and behind it the basic group was tightened. Jean suggested to attack, a place Good, narrow, convenient for us. But, having estimated their our forces, there fighters the person 15-20 was not less us all five, has allowed a command to follow them. We pursued them to the Most red wood, but further ... There was no sense to go Further. Emission, and Vyzhigatel nearby soon should begin. Have decided to return on Militari and to wait for them there, hope truth that they will return, at me almost was not. I not at any price there have not gone, to me the head is more expensive. But these scientists ... Something there very important for them. Have waited emission, on Military have waited still couple of days and have decided to return. Especially, Jean and one more was hit by stalkers. Jean - the cretin hot, does not like to wait, took yes Rushed on parking of stalkers. Has filled up a two, and the third, dexterous, bitch, it has appeared, valnul and Jean and the second (as him called? Fedot it seems). I and so some days have killed on this damn group of scientists did not begin to understand.
PDA the mercenary Gray.
Sakharov has told to me about expedition of scientists on Vyzhigatel. He assumes that all of them were lost. Well, it is necessary to check up most.
Conversation with Sakharov.
It there was a heavy conversation. I see death every day, but it is always heavy to come face to face with death so close. You still will take away skolkih people, the ZONE?
Conversation with the wounded scientist.
Short text messages (SMS)
Marked One, is Zahar! Dan have killed... Come, business is...
Marked One, Ghost disturbs! Come to me, business is...
Marked One, it I, Zahar! Dan was lost... Come to me, business is...
Marked One, it I, Zahar! Dan was lost... Come, when time will be, we will talk...
Clear Sky
Clerk, the commander of fighters "Clear Sky" at an entrance from Cordon, has asked to help to release the scout from paws of bandits which have settled down in territory of abandoned church.
Box with things of the Kalmyak.
Box with things of the Kalmyak. Usual iron, heavy enough container.
Ointment from the Kalmyak.
Ointment from the Kalmyak. Helps to stop a wound and reduces radiation level.
Kalmyak asks to find its backpack and to bring the container which lies in a backpack. A problem that near a backpack anomaly a teleport was formed.

Vasily, the repairman on base "Clear Sky" cannot be engaged to the affairs as at it the foot has swelled up. Ointment of the Kalmyak which can be got only at the Kalmyak though it is possible not only at it is urgently necessary to it.
Clerk can give you 3 banks of ointment of the Kalmyak, but in exchange wants to receive "the Soul" artefact.
Controller's brain.
Brain of the unique controller.
Bloodsucker's jaw
Blood covered lower jaw-bone of a Bloodsucker.
Red hand of a burer.
Hand of a Burer. A unique item ... hard to find

According to Sviblov there were lately unusual versions of the mutants, one of such mutants, is found out on bogs, on farm which to be in the northwest not far from railway branches. He asks you to bring to it a brain of this controller for research.

Sviblov will organise spot-check on any large monster and the powerful weapon urgently is required to it. On it he asks you to steal from bandits that have camped on an abandoned farm, for it machine gun PKM. He wants to perform operation whenever possible bloodless as the bandits do not want provatsirovat. Before you will go on the task, it is necessary to meet and talk over with the scout 'Clear Sky' on a nickname of Kashchej.
Documents of the dead Monolithian.
Documents of the dead Monolithian. Detailed enough map of bogs, what that strange marks on the map.
TV.
TV. Old, but like works, to a campaign Chinese about-va.
Notebook of the Monolithian.
Personal notebook of the Monolithian. Not the big notebook which can be put in a jacket or unloading pocket. Many stalkers carry with themselves same.

Cat is disturbed by occurrence of Monolithians on bogs. He asks to find two Monolithians at which with itself(himself) should be a certain information which should though as that to clear a situation and to understand that it it is necessary. That them to find to you it is necessary to find the person on base a Clear sky which to you would help to hang up a label on these Monolithians.
Chistonebovets can help to find to you Monolithians, but for it he asks to find to it the TV.
Modified «Iglomet»
Iglomet which shoots needles on which end microgauges.
Spets-needles.
Spets-needles in which are built in microgauges. At contact with a victim, tips of needles separate and the small microgauge enters into a body of a victim.

According to Holodova, on Agroprom has appeared unique - 'the red pseudo-giant'. He asks you to 'hang up' a label on this animal by means of altered iglometa which shoots needles on which end microgauges. In any case do not kill 'red the pseudo-giant'.
PDA the Frenchman. PDA the intermediary, usual personal PDA, which is at many stalkers.
PDA the Frenchman.
Portable muffler of a radio signal.
Portable muffler/suppressor of a radio signal. Suppresses activity of a radio signal in radius of 2 kilometres.

Borman asks to find the sniper-Monolithian who strongly to it disturbs, killing its people and to liquidate it. According to Borman, the sniper has sat down at area of not completed house (on building).

Borman asks to find 'muffler' which suppresses a radio signal of 'Freedom' and to carry to its Miser, on the basis of it will recode that it suppressed a signal of Monolithians, then 'muffler' it is necessary to carry into place, there where you have found it, thus you restore and will help to salt a radio signal of 'Freedom' to a monolith. To suppress it is necessary to search around not completed building (on building).
%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+80 \n%c[default]Medicine for the Kalmyak. The self-made medicine, under recipes of the grandmother of the Kalmyak, very well deduces radiation.

Sviblov asks to check the transaction, between "Freebie" and mercenaries, the meeting will occur on an abandoned farm in Cordon. While all is silent and quiet, do not catch sight to mercenaries, differently will break the transaction. A freebie should survive.
According to the Cat, on Agroprom have found out group of Monolithians, he asks to find them, and attempt to get from them the information.
Kejs Sviblova.
%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+30 \n%c[default]Kejs Sviblova. In a case what that flasks though the case also protects from radiation, fonit from a case God grant.
According to Zahar, on the basis of Avengers from the Swamps, just now to be Brother Louis, one of heads of avengers, it is necessary to learn from it where to be the Frenchman.
Frenchman hidden in warehouses, on the basis of freedom from avengers, it is necessary to hurry, while it was got by avengers.
Dealer Rabinovich, unique clue to understand that has conceived a monolith. The cat sends you to the Miser, as he said, they had any common causes.
Anigiljator of anomalies.
Anigiljator of anomalies. It is intended for destruction of anomalies, including teleports. Using it is simple; throw the device into the anomaly in front of you, and the rest is history...
Sviblov asks to find the missing Courier on the Radar. The courier went on Yantar so probably it is necessary to look for him in territory of the complex of the Brain Scorcher.

Shadowman asks to help stalkers that stand near to tower camps in red wood to beat off from monsters. It has left for you on the second floor a backpack, in Kotormo the winchester and cartridges lies. Take the weapon and cartridges to itself and help stalkers to beat off from monsters. It is necessary that at least one of stalkers has survived, differently all your works on their rescue are vain.
Shadowman asks to help to beat off to stalkers the bridge at mercenaries which conducts on Limansk.
Fang asks to retrieve some documents from some Hunters in the Red Forest.

Fang asks to find his comrade who has gone to the Red Forest, to check up on a hiding place, in old abandoned mine, but two days has passed, and he hasn't returned or been in contact. It is necessary to find Denis, and bring back whats in the stash.
